publicationStmt.publisher: At the Theater in Oxford, 1678. And are to be sold by William Leak at the Crown in Fleet-street, Lond[on],

notesStmt.note: "The whole duty of man" is attributed to Richard Allestree. Sometimes also attributed to Dorothy Pakington, John Fell, Humphrey Henchman, and Richard Sterne.
The frontispiece is signed: burg. sculp., i.e. Michael Burghers.
In this edition the weathervane in title-page metal cut points up and to the left.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
